> ::Lord Elder::
> 
> Elder looked around to the others in the shuttle.
> 
=
> Elder: Well that changes things a bit. We don't have
> a Hot Rod to bring=
 the Matrix back too. Pilot, take off
> and follow those Minions. We'll hel=
p Legacy with this.
> 
> The shuttle soon takes off and heads in the same d=
irection
> as Legacy and the Minions. They quickly catch up.
> 
> Elder: Co=
ntinue to fire at will.
> 
> The shuttle continues to fire plasma blasts at=
 the Minions.
=A0
Legacy continued moving after the minions, maintaining hi=
s communications block on them, trying to cut them off from reporting in to=
 anyone else, as he shielding absorbed stray blasts and his hull singed und=
er the more directed ones. 
(OOC:=A0It's up to you Airly as to when you rea=
ch Atlantis, or if one of us attackers=A0stops you first.)=A0
> OOC: I assu=
me you'll correct the Rodimus/Atlantis thing
> after you read my earlier po=
st. So I ignored that part.
=A0
OOC: I appreciate that, but I will leave it=
 as is. Legacy had said =A1conjectural analysis=A2 had led him to that stat=
ement, which meant that=A0it was a guess. That should lead Lord Elder to a =
disturbing guess on his part: "no one who knew where Dark Rodimus went, sur=
vived to give an accurate report." >:D
Plus as the timelines diverge Legacy=
=A2s knowledge will become less and less accurate as things change, I don=
=A2t mind him being wrong in this. However please ignore the part about Sco=
urge being on his way to Atlantis, that would not be true, he would be goin=
g to that old base. 
=A0
Preston(Legacy)
